Plot: An Ivy League professor is lured back to his Oklahoma hometown, where his twin brother, a small-time pot grower, has concocted a scheme to take down a local drug lord.
Title: Leaves of Grass
Actors: Edward Norton, Lucy DeVito, Kent Jude Bernard, Amelia Campbell
tomatoConsensus: Edward Norton delivers one of his finest performances in Leaves of Grass, but he's overpowered by the movie's many jarring tonal shifts.
